Board Members

Dr. C Krishna Mohan

Founder

Dr. C. Krishna Mohan is currently a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering and the Dean of Public and Corporate Relations at the Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad (IIT Hyderabad), India. He has been with IIT Hyderabad since 2009. More

Dr. R Sai Chandra Teja

Founder

He received the B.Tech. Degree in Electronics and Communications Engineering from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur, Pulivendula, India in 2010, the M.Tech Degree in Microelectronics & VLSI from IIT Hyderabad, India, in 2012, and a Ph.D. Degree at Osaka University, Osaka, Japan in 2020.
